Question: Guangzhou Chiyang Scent Technology Co.,Lt CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Guangzhou Chiyang Scent Technology Co., Ltd.

Aroma Diffuser

- Scenta New Design Bluetooth Control Electric Essential Oil Diffuser
- Wall Mounted Auto Cool Mist Spray Smart Hotel Aroma Diffuser
- Scenta Commercial Large Capacity Metal Design HVAC Air Scent System Waterless Essential Oil Electric Aroma Diffuser Machine
- Scenta Private Label 150ml Tabletop Electronic Smart Scent Diffuser Hotel Lobby Fragrance Air HVAC Bluetooth Oil Diffuser
- Established in 2008, SCENTA specializes in automatic aroma diffusers with advanced atomizing technologies
- Offers OEM & ODM services, with 12 years' experience in research and development
- Exported to over 80 countries and regions, including Europe, America, Africa, and the Middle East
- ISO9001, CE, FCC, RoHS certified products
- Factory strength with 200+ workers and 5000 area
- R& D capability with independent R& D center and experienced senior engineers
- Quality guarantee with built-in QC testing room and professional QC inspectors
Summary_cn:
广州赤阳香氛科技有限公司。

香薰机

- 赛恩塔 新设计蓝牙控制电动精油扩香机
- 壁挂自动冷雾喷雾智能酒店香氛扩香机
- 赛恩塔 商用大容量金属设计暖通空调香氛系统无水电动精油扩香机
- 赛恩塔 私人定制150毫升台式智能香氛扩香机酒店大堂香氛空调蓝牙精油扩香机
- 成立于2008年，赛恩塔专注于配备先进雾化技术的自动香氛扩香机
- 提供OEM和ODM服务，拥有12年的研发经验
- 出口到80多个国家和地区，包括欧洲、美洲、非洲和中东地区
- ISO9001、CE、FCC、RoHS认证产品
- 具备200多名工人和5000平方米的工厂实力
- 独立的研发中心和经验丰富的高级工程师
- 内置质量控制测试间和专业质检员，质量有保证
